$schema.description: Optional path or URL to this schema for editor validation.

intros.description: Whether to collect personality bios from each model before the conversation starts. Defaults to true.

interrupts.description: Whether to collect interrupt triggers from each model (requires a moderator to be configured). Defaults to true.

moderator.description: A fast, cheap model that watches the conversation stream and decides when another participant should interrupt the current speaker. Each participant declares 'interrupt triggers' at the start; the moderator watches for matches in real time.

url.description: Base URL of the OpenAI-compatible API for the moderator model.

token.description: API authentication token for the moderator provider.

providers.description: List of OpenAI-compatible API providers. Each provider specifies a base URL, auth token, and the models available through it. Model names must be unique across all providers.

url.description: Base URL of the OpenAI-compatible API (e.g. "https://openrouter.ai/api/v1", "https://api.openai.com/v1").

token.description: API authentication token for this provider.

models.description: List of model IDs available through this provider.
